TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogConfiguration extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 包含事件記錄檔的靜態資訊和組態設定。

span.span: Contains static information and configuration settings for an event log.

summary.span: 許多組態設定都是由建立記錄檔的事件提供者所定義。

span.span: Many of the configurations settings were defined by the event provider that created the log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性為此物件變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If a property is changed for this object, call the method to save the changes. ## Examples 例如程式碼使用這個類別中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 設定與讀取事件記錄檔屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d2b00b3-2d1d-4567-a47e-3f5a7c1955ac)。For example code using this class, see [How to: Configure and Read Event Log Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d2b00b3-2d1d-4567-a47e-3f5a7c1955ac).

span.span: The name of the local event log for which to get information and configuration settings.

summary.span: 藉由指定要取得資訊和組態設定的本機事件記錄檔，初始化新的 物件。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string logName, class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession session) cil managed
Public Sub New (logName As String, session As EventLogSession)

param.name: logName
param.span: 要取得資訊和組態設定的事件記錄檔名稱。

span.span: The name of the event log for which to get information and configuration settings.

param.name: session
param.span: 事件記錄工作階段，用來判斷指定的記錄所屬的事件記錄服務。

span.span: The event log session used to determine the event log service that the specified log belongs to.

param.span: 工作階段會連接到本機電腦或遠端電腦上的事件記錄服務。

span.span: The session is either connected to the event log service on the local computer or a remote computer.

summary.span: 藉由指定要取得資訊和組態設定的記錄檔名稱，初始化新的 物件。

span.span: Initializes a new object by specifying the name of the log for which to get information and configuration settings.

summary.span: 根據指定的事件記錄工作階段，記錄檔可以位於本機電腦或遠端電腦。

span.span: The log can be on the local computer or a remote computer, based on the event log session specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsClassicLog As Boolean
public: property bool IsClassicLog { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得旗標，這個旗標表示事件記錄檔是否為傳統事件記錄檔。

span.span: Gets the flag that indicates if the event log is a classic event log.

summary.span: 傳統事件記錄檔的事件是在 .mc 檔案中定義，而非事件提供者所使用的資訊清單 (.xml 檔案)。

span.span: A classic event log is one that has its events defined in a .mc file instead of a manifest (.xml file) used by the event provider.

value.span: 如果是傳統事件記錄檔，則傳回 ，如果不是傳統事件記錄檔，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the event log is a classic log, and returns if the event log is not a classic log.

span.span: Technology Summary for Reading and Managing Event Logs

related.span: 事件記錄檔案例

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，這個值可決定事件記錄檔是已啟用還是已停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether the event log is enabled or disabled.

summary.span: 已啟用的記錄檔可以記錄事件，而已停用的記錄檔則無法記錄事件。

span.span: An enabled log is one in which events can be logged, and a disabled log is one in which events cannot be logged.

value.span: 如果記錄檔已啟用，則傳回 ，如果記錄檔已停用，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the log is enabled, and returns if the log is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.

member this.LogFilePath : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定存放事件之記錄檔的目錄路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the file directory path to the location of the file where the events are stored for the log.

value.span: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件記錄檔的路徑。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the path to the event log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.

span.span: Gets an value that specifies whether the event log is an application, system, or custom event log.

span.span: Gets or sets an value that determines how events are handled when the event log becomes full.

value.span: 傳回 值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaximumSizeInBytes { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaximumSizeInBytes : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的事件記錄檔大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, that the event log file is allowed to be.

summary.span: 當檔案達到這個大小上限時，就表示檔案已滿。

span.span: When the file reaches this maximum size, it is considered full.

value.span: 傳回長數值，這個值表示允許的事件記錄檔大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Returns a long value that represents the maximum size, in bytes, that the event log file is allowed to be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.

summary.span: 取得建立這個事件記錄檔之事件提供者的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the event provider that created this event log.

value.span: 傳回字串，這個字串包含建立這個事件記錄檔的事件提供者名稱。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the name of the event provider that created this event log.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderBufferSize As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> ProviderBufferSize { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 取得緩衝區大小，事件提供者會使用這個緩衝區將事件發行至記錄檔。

span.span: Gets the size of the buffer that the event provider uses for publishing events to the log.

value.span: 傳回整數值，這個值可以為 null。

span.span: Returns an integer value that can be null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderControlGuid As Nullable(Of Guid)
public: property Nullable<Guid> ProviderControlGuid { Nullable<Guid> get(); };

summary.span: 如果事件記錄檔是偵錯記錄檔，則取得此事件記錄檔的控制項全域唯一識別項 (GUID)。

span.span: Gets the control globally unique identifier (GUID) for the event log if the log is a debug log.

summary.span: 如果不是偵錯記錄檔，這個值將會是 null。

span.span: If this log is not a debug log, this value will be null.

value.span: 傳回 GUID 值或 null。

span.span: Returns a GUID value or null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ProviderKeywords As Nullable(Of Long)
public: property Nullable<long> ProviderKeywords { Nullable<long> get(); void set(Nullable<long> value); };
member this.ProviderKeywords : Nullable<int64> with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定事件提供者使用的關鍵字遮罩。

span.span: Gets or sets keyword mask used by the event provider.

value.span: 傳回長數值，如果事件提供者未定義任何關鍵字，則傳回 null。

span.span: Returns a long value that can be null if the event provider did not define any keywords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderLatency As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> ProviderLatency { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 取得事件提供者將事件發行至記錄檔時，所使用的最大延遲時間。

span.span: Gets the maximum latency time used by the event provider when publishing events to the log.

value.span: 傳回整數值，如果事件提供者未指定任何延遲時間，則傳回 null。

span.span: Returns an integer value that can be null if no latency time was specified by the event provider.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ProviderLevel As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> ProviderLevel { Nullable<int> get(); void set(Nullable<int> value); };
member this.ProviderLevel : Nullable<int> with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定事件記錄檔中允許記錄的最大事件等級 (會定義事件的嚴重性)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum event level (which defines the severity of the event) that is allowed to be logged in the event log.

summary.span: 這個值由事件提供者定義。

span.span: This value is defined by the event provider.

value.span: 傳回整數值，如果事件提供者中未定義最大事件等級，則傳回 null。

span.span: Returns an integer value that can be null if the maximum event level was not defined in the event provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.

public: property Nullable<int> ProviderMaximumNumberOfBuffers { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 取得事件提供者將事件發行至事件記錄檔時，所使用的最大緩衝區數目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of buffers used by the event provider to publish events to the event log.

value.span: 傳回整數值，這個值表示事件提供者將事件發行至事件記錄檔時，所使用的最大緩衝區數目。

span.span: Returns an integer value that is the maximum number of buffers used by the event provider to publish events to the event log.

value.span: 這個值可以是 null。

span.span: This value can be null.

summary.span: 取得可列舉的集合，包含可將事件發行至這個事件記錄檔的所有事件提供者名稱。

span.span: Gets an enumerable collection of the names of all the event providers that can publish events to this event log.

value.span: 傳回可列舉的字串集合，這些字串包含事件提供者名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SecurityDescriptor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SecurityDescriptor : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定事件記錄檔的安全性描述元 (Security Descriptor)。

span.span: Gets or sets the security descriptor of the event log.

summary.span: 安全性描述元會定義可讀取和寫入事件記錄檔的使用者和使用者群組。

span.span: The security descriptor defines the users and groups of users that can read and write to the event log.

value.span: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件記錄檔的安全性描述元。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the security descriptor for the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性的值變更時，呼叫方法來儲存所做的變更。If the value of this property is changed, call the method to save the changes.
